sources.title: Little Anglers (1952)
sources.description: Papa Bear is off for a relaxing day of fishing at the lake, but he is followed by his little cubs, who proceed to make his day miserable. They catch more fish than he does and use unconventional ways to do it, and they are also responsible for him getting dunked in the water several times. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/little-anglers-1952/

metadata.Plot: Papa Bear is off for a relaxing day of fishing at the lake, but he is followed by his little cubs, who proceed to make his day miserable. They catch more fish than he does and use unconventional ways to do it, and they are also responsible for him getting dunked in the water several times.
metadata.Actors: Roy Halee, Doug Moye, Philip A. Scheib
